title: ActivityIndicator
desc: Displays a circular loading indicator.

title: Button
desc: A basic button component that should render nicely on any platform.

title: FlatList
desc: A component for rendering performant scrollable lists.

title: Image
desc: A component for displaying images.

title: ImageBackground
desc: A common feature request from developers familiar with the web is background-image.

title: KeyboardAvoidingView
desc: Provides a view that moves out of the way of the virtual keyboard automatically.

title: Modal
desc: Provides a simple way to present content above an enclosing view.

title: Pressable
desc: Pressable is a Core Component wrapper that can detect various stages of press interactions on any of its defined children.

title: RefreshControl
desc: This component is used inside a Scrollview to add pull to referesh functionallity.

title: ScrollView
desc: Provides a scrolling container that can host multiple components and views.

title: SectionList
desc: Like FlatList, but for sectioned lists .

title: StatusBar
desc: Component to control the app's status bar.

title: Switch
desc: Renders a Boolean input.

title: Text
desc: A React component for displaying text.

title: TextInput
desc: A component for inputting text into the app via a keyboard.

title: TouchableHighlight
desc: A wrapper for making views respond properly to touches.

title: TouchableOpacity
desc: A wrapper for making views respond properly to touches.

title: TouchableWithoutFeedback
desc: Do not use unless you have a very good reason.

title: View
desc: The most fundamental component for building a UI.

title: VirtualizedList
desc: Virtualization massively improves memory consumption and performance of large lists by maintaining a finite render window of active items.

title: DrawerLayoutAndroid
desc: React component that wraps the platform DrawerLayout (Android only).

title: TouchableNativeFeedback
desc: A wrapper for making views respond properly to touches (Android only).

title: InputAccessoryView
desc: A component which enables customization of the keyboard input accessory view on iOS.

title: SafeAreaView
desc: The purpose of SafeAreaView is to render content within the safe area boundaries of a device.
